title: Neymar Jr.: The King of Daring
description:
Armed with rocket-like acceleration and outrageous trickery, Neymar has stepped up to every challenge he's faced so far.

His supreme displays on the field and playful craziness off it make him Next Wave.

asset.author: Nike
asset.hookText:
Armed with rocket-like acceleration and outrageous trickery, Neymar has stepped up to every challenge he's faced so far.

His supreme displays on the field and playful craziness off it make him Next Wave.

His talent and hunger make him a once-in-a-generation player.

Who's Next? http://gonike.me/6013RAKc
